word_mean_info__list.difference: 指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
指一往一返，相当于go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。
口语用词，与fetch基本同义，语气随便。
指使用车辆或机械设备把人或货物从一处运载到另一处。
指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。

bilingual.source: Her new Ebola test is safe to transport and easy to use.
bilingual.target: 她的新埃博拉测试安全易用，便于运输。

bilingual.source: The car also solved an enormous problem caused by using horses for transport in cities.
bilingual.target: 汽车还解决了在城市中使用马匹运输造成的巨大问题。

bilingual.source: In some cases, local produce might have used more energy and produced more greenhouse gases than produce grown a long way away – even taking into account its transport.
bilingual.target: 在某些情况下，本地农产品可能比远距离种植的农产品消耗更多能源并产生更多温室气体，即使考虑到运输因素。

bilingual.source: Railway transport is more eco-friendly than road transport.
bilingual.target: 铁路运输比公路运输更环保。
快速运输可以节省时间。

bilingual.source: They use the yak to transport goods.
bilingual.target: 他们用牦牛来运输物资。
他们使用卡车来运输货物。
他们用集装箱运输货物。

list.abstract: transport（英[ˈtrænspɔːt , trænˈspɔːt]，美[ˈtrænspɔːrt , trænˈspɔːrt]），英语单词，作动词为运输；运送；输送，作名词为交通系统；运输工具；强烈的感情。短语搭配有public transport（公共交通）。例句为“It is efficiently used for transport.（它可以有效地用于运输。）” 该单词名词的近义词为carriage、traffic、conveyance，及物动词的近义词为convey，相关反义词为disenchant，transportation译为运输，by transport译为通过运输，transport system译为传输系统。

yingyinNormal.en: I started SpaceX with the idea of trying to revolutionize space transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱有试图改革空间运输的想法，我开创了SpaceX公司。

yingyinNormal.en: Container transport is like a game, of empty boxes to be filled, and full boxes to be emptied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 集装箱运输就像一场游戏，被不断地装填和卸载。

yingyinNormal.en: Camponotus pennsylvanicus. Alternatively known as a carpenter ant. Ideal for ground and air transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宾夕法尼亚弓背蚁，俗称木工蚁，适合于地面和航空运输。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, on or about May 25 of this year, Mr. Cary Agos conspired to transport and sell $1.3 million in...
yingyinNormal.zh: 大约在今年的5月25日，凯里艾格斯先生共谋运输及出售了价值130万的...

yingyinNormal.en: If you can, in fact, land the rocket safely and then reuse it with a minimal amount of effort then you can dramatically reduce the cost of space transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你可以使火箭安全着陆，然后借助极小的花费重新使用它然后你就可以显著地，降低太空运输成本。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, Dave, bikes are an important form of transport in China, planes and trains can be too expensive for people, so the humble bike is often the only way thousands of workers can get home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，戴夫，摩托是中国的一种重要运输形式，火车和飞机对于人们来说可能太昂贵了，所以简陋的摩托车就成了成千上万的农民工唯一的回家方式。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在说什么，我们不能运人。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, because he's charged with conspiracy to transport heroin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为他被起诉共谋贩卖海洛因。

yingyinNormal.en: Were you with him on May 25? I never heard about any drug transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你5月25日和他在一起吗？我没听说有什么毒品运送。

yingyinNormal.en: They're saying that he helped transport $1.3 million in heroin on May 25.
yingyinNormal.zh: 警方说他在5月25日帮助运送价值130万的海洛因。

yingyinNormal.en: It defied your laws of physics, to transport matter through time and space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这打破了你们的物理学定理，物质一定要通过时间空间传输。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, she was great, right? I mean, she could just, like... Transport you. Oh, yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，她超棒的，对吧？我是说，她可以，像……让你感同身受。嗯，是。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a transport tag for fish who can't cut it inside the institute. They get transferred to permanent digs. An aquarium. In Cleveland.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是把不能适应的鱼送走的标签，被转送到水族馆永久安置。在克里夫兰。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks to Hong Kong's excellent public transport system, quiet beaches, sparsely populated islands and wild places are never more than short ride away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多得香港的完善交通系统，令到宁静的海滩、人烟稀少的岛屿和郊野地点都可方便前往。

yingyinNormal.en: Their hometown of Qiqihar is in the far northeast, a distance of 950 miles, a journey that would take 36 hours by conventional transport, but not anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的家乡齐齐哈尔在东北深处，一段一千五百多公里的距离。传统的交通工具需要花费三十六小时，而那已是过去。

yingyinNormal.en: But that is nothing compared to the pressure on the Chinese transport system when around a billion people want to travel home for new year and all at the same time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是相比于中国的交通系统，大约10亿人同时要出门回家，这个压力实在微不足道。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no. If I just take your tag, I can take your place on the transport truck, then you can go back inside, and find your family. All you have to do is give me the tag.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，要是我戴上你的标签，就能代替你坐上转送卡车，你就能回到里面——找到你爸妈。你把标签给我就行了。

yingyinNormal.en: New technology is key to not only the transport systems in China's cities, but also to transporting the Chinese to places beyond the confines of China, and even out of the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新技术是关键。不仅对中国的城市交通系统是如此，对于把中国人送出中国更是如此，甚至冲出地球。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 交通工具; 运输系统

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage: transport作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或者代词，如：transport logs by trains，；也可用于被动结构

(运送部队/给养等的)船/飞机/卡车

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 运输；运送；输送；流刑；流放；交通工具；运输系统

word_family.mean: v. 运输；运送；输送；将…流放到流放地；使…感觉置身于另一境地；使…充满强烈情感

sense_info_list.en: a vehicle or method of travel
sense_info_list.zh: 交通工具; 旅行方式; 交通运输系统

examination_example.sentence: She ignores the various benefits of public <highlight>transport</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她忽视了公共交通工具的各种好处。

examination_example.sentence: Some claim that you want to force everyone to eat a vegetarian diet and make private <highlight>transport</highlight> illegal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人声称，你想强迫所有人吃素，并将私人交通定为非法。

examination_example.sentence: Other <highlight>transport</highlight> must come under far greater scrutiny.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他交通工具造成的环境损害必须受到更严格的审查。

sense_info_list.en:
take something or someone from one place to another in a vehicle;
the movement of people or goods from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: They are a technological leap, <highlight>transporting</highlight> iron ore along routes which run for hundreds of kilometers from mines to their destinations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是一项技术飞跃，将铁矿石从矿山运输到目的地，运输路线长达数百公里。

examination_example.sentence: Vast quantities of iron ore are then <highlight>transported</highlight> by autonomous trains to ocean ports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就这样，大量铁矿石通过自动列车运输到海港。

examination_example.sentence: New electric engines will contribute to a more efficient, integrated <highlight>transport</highlight> system that is less polluting and less noisy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新的电动发动机将有助于建立一个更高效、更一体化、污染更少、噪音更低的运输系统。

examination_example.sentence: The flying car has always remained the ultimate symbol of personal <highlight>transport</highlight> freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞行汽车始终是个人运输自由的最终象征。

sense_info_list.en: a ship, plane, lorry, or truck used for carrying soldiers, supplies, or others from one place to another
sense_info_list.zh: (运送部队/给养等的)船/飞机/卡车

sample.mean: v. 办理；处理
v. 转移；转乘；转搭；转让；移交；转变；调动；改行

exam_freq_info.chinese: 交通工具; 旅行方式; 交通运输系统

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (供长途卡车司机用餐的)路边小餐馆

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 运输；运送；输送；流刑；流放；交通工具；运输系统

word_family.mean: v. 运输；运送；输送；将…流放到流放地；使…感觉置身于另一境地；使…充满强烈情感

sense_info_list.en:
take something or someone from one place to another in a vehicle; 
the movement of people or goods from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: A package holiday would include your flights, hotels, meals, day trips to different places of interest and <highlight>transport</highlight> to and from the airport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 度假套餐将包括您的航班、酒店、餐饮、感兴趣的不同景点的一日游以及往返机场的交通。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>transport</highlight> minister advised people in parts of Scotland covered by the orange alert to avoid travel on Wednesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通部长建议出现橙色警报的苏格兰部分地区的居民周三避免出行。

examination_example.sentence: Service stations came with the motorway and the legend of the <highlight>transport</highlight> cafe was born.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 服务站随高速公路而来，交通咖啡馆的传奇由此诞生。

sense_info_list.en: a vehicle or method of travel;
sense_info_list.zh: 交通工具; 旅行方式; 交通运输系统

examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行时使用公共交通工具。

examination_example.sentence: The Olympic suffered two crashes with other ships and went on to serve as a hospital ship and troop <highlight>transport</highlight> in World War I.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥林匹克号与其他船发生过两次相撞事件，但接着仍然在第一次世界大战中充当了医疗船和军队运输船。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 运输；运送；输送；流刑；流放；交通工具；运输系统

word_family.mean: v. 运输；运送；输送；将…流放到流放地；使…感觉置身于另一境地；使…充满强烈情感

sense_info_list.en: take something or someone from one place to another in a vehicle; the movement of people or goods from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: When people attend a concert, they are paying for music, sure, maybe even hotel rooms, meals, and <highlight>transport</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们去听音乐会的时候，他们会为音乐买单，当然，可能还会为酒店房间、餐饮和交通买单。

examination_example.sentence: Fourteen wolves were caught in Canada and <highlight>transported</highlight> to the park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 14只狼在加拿大被捕获，并被送往公园。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 运输；运送；输送；流刑；流放；交通工具；运输系统

word_family.mean: v. 运输；运送；输送；将…流放到流放地；使…感觉置身于另一境地；使…充满强烈情感

sense_info_list.en: take something or someone from one place to another in a vehicle; the movement of people or goods from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: For example, buildings, holds, public <highlight>transport</highlight> and other public places are becoming more wheelchair friendly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，建筑、货仓、公共交通和其他公共场所变得更加方便轮（通行）。

examination_example.sentence: It's still an important part of the <highlight>transport</highlight> system in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它仍然是中国交通系统的重要组成部分。

examination_example.sentence: How was she going to <highlight>transport</highlight> a 17-pound swan on her bike all that way?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她要怎么用自行车一路运送一只17磅重的天鹅呢？
